name: MyPhone X1
description: MyPhone X1 is a mid-range smartphone with 6.4-inch OLED display, 6GB RAM, 128GB storage, 48MP main camera, 4000mAh battery, and fast charging.

name: Competitor OnePhone Z
description: OnePhone Z features 6.7-inch AMOLED, 8GB RAM, 256GB storage, 108MP camera, 5000mAh battery, 65W fast charging, and IP68 water resistance.

name: Compete Pro
description: Compete Pro offers 6.5-inch display, 8GB RAM, 128GB storage, 64MP camera, 4500mAh battery, wireless charging, and premium build quality.
